item.title: can't sleep. stupid cold.
item.description: seirously. i just lay in bed. feeling sick. breathing out of my mouth and bummed that i can’t sleep. so i thought up a couple interesting ideas that i would like to take up in the next couple months. First - a set of discrete devices that are connected via a bluetooth PAN. like a small network of ambient devices: a glowing orb, a dial, “agent,” a couple small black boxes to integrate with stereo’s or video signals and of course a way to integrate with cell phones.
